data.eml:eml: Two new species of Ovitamon Ng & Takeda, 1992 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Potamidae) from the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Manuel-Santos, Marivene R., Ng, Peter K. L. (2013): Two new species of Ovitamon Ng & Takeda, 1992 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Potamidae) from the Philippines. Zootaxa 3619 (3): 394-400, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3619.3.8
